page.title: 17Hassall Green Home Life
page.content: My Dad is the first to get up in the morning. He goes to work at Hay's Chemicals. He sets off to work at 6:50 At that time my Mum is working nights at Roadchef on the motorway. She goes to work at 10:00pm and sells petrol, sweets, fizzy drinks and cigarettes. She comes home at 7:20am. My Mum makes breakfast when my sister and I come down and then we get ready for school. When my Mum has taken us to school she will come home, tidy up and put Roly our dog outside for a couple of minutes. If she is working she will let Roly back in and go to bed. If she isn't she will do washing or baking or shopping or simply nothing. When we get home the tele is put on. I help fetch the tea things in the front room and I watch a few programmes on the tele. I go to bed fairly late. We read for 10 minutes then I go to sleep.
